generic <typename T> public ref class ParallelForEach sealed : System::Activities::NativeActivity

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 集合中提供的值的类型。

span.span: The type of the values provided in the collection.

summary.span: 枚举集合元素并对集合中的每个元素并行执行嵌入语句。

span.span: Enumerates the elements of a collection and executes an embedded statement for each element of the collection in parallel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 嵌入的语句一起计划并异步运行，但除非计划的活动本身是异步的（例如，消息传递活动、或从 派生的活动），否则它们不会在单独的线程上运行，因此每个连续的活动仅在之前安排的活动完成或进入空闲状态时执行。The embedded statements are scheduled together and run asynchronously, but unless the scheduled activities themselves are asynchronous (such as messaging activities, , or activities that derive from ), they do not run on separate threads, so each successive activity will only execute when the previously scheduled activity completes or goes idle. 如果此活动没有任何异步的或进入空闲状态的子活动，则此活动将采用与 活动相同的方式执行。If none of the child activities of this activity are asynchronous or go idle, this activity execute in the same way that a activity does. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 活动。The following code sample demonstrates creating a activity. 此示例来自[公司购买过程](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/corporate-purchase-process)示例。This example is from the [Corporate Purchase Process](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/corporate-purchase-process) sample. [!code-csharp[wfs_PurchaseProcess#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wfs_purchaseprocess/cs/purchaseprocessworkflow.cs#1)]

summary.span: 在每个迭代完成后计算。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果其计算结果为 `true`，则取消已安排的挂起的迭代。If it evaluates to `true`, then the scheduled pending iterations are canceled. 如果未设置此属性，则所有安排的语句都将执行，直至完成为止。If this property is not set, all scheduled statements execute until completion.
